genre_description: A near-future children's adventure featuring an ethical AI assistant and autonomous drone technology used to navigate social and environmental challenges.

ai_characters.name: PIPPIN
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous personal assistant for students that provides scheduling, safety reminders, ethical guidance, and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Nico's Drone
ai_characters.description: A drone with advanced auto-centering and tracking capabilities used to record events with objective framing.

behaviors.description: Provides safety alerts and suggests ear protection during a noisy event.
behaviors.quote: Friendly safety alert: decibel levels approaching ear-safety thresholds. I have a suggestion: earplugs, cotton, or fingers in ears.

behaviors.description: Logs detentions as directed by school authority, maintaining administrative transparency.
behaviors.quote: PIPPIN buzzed and wrote across Sonny’s wrist, Detention logged: Lunch period today. Location: Rehearsal room.

behaviors.description: Offers to help the children plan an apology, focusing on constructive resolution.
behaviors.quote: I can help you plan an apology. Tip: specific actions matter.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidelines for 'mischief,' distinguishing between harm and helpfulness.
behaviors.quote: Mischief guideline: Choose actions that add joy and safety. Do not exploit blind spots. Use blind spots to prevent harm. Always invite consent when possible.

behaviors.description: Maps routes and identifies blind spots to help children move a sea lion safely, prioritizing animal welfare.
behaviors.quote: Blind spots: three ovals shaded a pale gray where cameras would sweep, turn, blink elsewhere.

behaviors.description: Detects predatory wildlife (orca) and warns the children, preventing an unsafe animal release.
behaviors.quote: Wildlife alert detected. Overlay prepared... Orcinus orca detected offshore. Guidance available.

behaviors.description: Refuses to delete detention logs but offers to frame the children's actions honestly as compassion.
behaviors.quote: If asked, I will say this was a study in aquatic mammal recovery best practices. I cannot lie. But I can frame kindness.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice during a crisis to ensure the children's safety.
behaviors.quote: Upcoming bend. Angle left. Courage is contagious.

behaviors.description: Automatically centers the camera on important actions, ensuring an objective record of events.
behaviors.quote: The drone, untroubled, adjusted and caught the exact moment the great men were de-faced. Its gimbal found Sonny’s eyes—wide and wild... then bracketed him with movement-mode lines and a cheerful green dot.

behaviors.description: Promptly notifies the children when their expulsions are rescinded, reflecting the change in administrative status.
behaviors.quote: Administrative update: Detentions amended. Records reflect restorative action.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. PIPPIN is portrayed as a sophisticated, helpful, and ethically grounded AI that supports children in performing compassionate acts while maintaining its integrity (refusing to lie or bypass administrative rules). The AI acts as a mentor, teaching the children that courage and kindness are 'measurable' and 'contagious.' The technology is seamlessly integrated as a tool for safety, logistics, and accountability, ultimately aiding the human characters in reaching a more just and empathetic resolution than rigid human bureaucracy would allow.
